original: Larsson, Lars Gunnar, läroverksadjunkt, Älmhult, f. 13/12/97 i Loshult, Kri:s t. 1., av Erik L. o. Ellen Kristens-son. G. 36 m. Clara Andersson. — Stud:ex. i Lund 16, fil. mag. där 22. Lär. v. 0’Sby samsk. 19-20, vik, lär. i Trelleborg 22, e. o, i Finspång 22, Ör-kelljunga 23-24, Älmhult 24-26, ord. ämneslär, i’Älmhult 27, adj. i matem., fysik o. kemi v, samrealsk. där sed. 45.
translated: Larsson, Lars Gunnar, high school teacher, Älmhult, b. 13/12/1897 in Loshult, Kristianstad county, son of Erik L. and Ellen Kristensson. Married in 1936 to Clara Andersson. Graduated from Lund University in 1916, with a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1922. Taught at O'Sby coeducational school from 1919-1920, substitute teacher in Trelleborg in 1922, temporary teacher in Finspång in 1922, Örkelljunga 1923-1924, Älmhult 1924-1926, permanent subject teacher in Älmhult from 1927, adjunct teacher in mathematics, physics, and chemistry at the secondary school from 1945 onward.
